#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        string s;
        cin>>s;
        int y=0;
        for(int i=0;i<s.length();i++)
        {
            y = y + s[i];
        }
        char c = (char)(y/s.length());
        cout<<c<<endl;
    }


    return 0;
}
